DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year assent was signed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Agreement for treatment by a primary participant or recipient who is unable to legally consent to treatment; applies to minor children and adults lacking capacity to consent for themselves. In these circumstances agreement/assent will come from the participant and formal consent will come from a parent or a legally authorized representative._A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out._Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; having a handwritten signature.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Agreement for treatment by a primary participant or recipient who is unable to legally consent to treatment; applies to minor children and adults lacking capacity to consent for themselves. In these circumstances agreement/assent will come from the participant and formal consent will come from a parent or a legally authorized representative.:A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.

Concepts.definition: Agreement for treatment by a primary participant or recipient who is unable to legally consent to treatment; applies to minor children and adults lacking capacity to consent for themselves. In these circumstances agreement/assent will come from the participant and formal consent will come from a parent or a legally authorized representative.
A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.

Property.preferredDefinition: Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; an identifying feature or characteristic of something or someone; an alternative term for motif or pattern; the part of the prescription that contains directions to the patient for taking of medicine.

Concepts.definition: Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; having a handwritten signature.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
